mapper.select: SELECT STO_NUM, STO_NAME, STO_TEL, STO_OPEN, STO_CLOSE, STO_ADDR, STO_INTRO, ORD_LIMIT, DELI_TIME, ENTER_YN, OPEN_YN, CEO_NAME, DELIVERY, STO_EMAIL, APRV_STATUS, SI.BRAND_CODE, USER_ID, B.BRAND_PIC, B.STO_BRAND FROM STORE_INFO SI JOIN BRAND B ON SI.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE WHERE STO_NAME LIKE '%' || #{search_input} || '%' AND OPEN_YN = 'Y'

SELECT STO_NUM, BRAND_PIC, STO_NAME, STO_BRAND FROM( SELECT S.STO_NUM, BRAND_PIC, STO_NAME, STO_BRAND, SUM(ORD_PRICE) FROM STORE_INFO S JOIN ORDER_PRO O ON S.STO_NUM = O.STO_NUM JOIN BRAND B ON S.BRAND_CODE = B.BRAND_CODE GROUP BY S.STO_NUM, BRAND_PIC, STO_NAME, STO_BRAND ORDER BY SUM(ORD_PRICE) DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
